questions: Can you elaborate on your experience with Kubernetes and Docker? How have you utilized these technologies in your previous roles?
How proficient are you in Python programming? Can you provide examples of projects where you have used Python effectively?
What specific achievements or successes have you had in the field of Information Technology during your 7 years of experience?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and developments in the IT industry, particularly in relation to Kubernetes and Docker?
Can you discuss a challenging project you worked on that required the use of Kubernetes, Docker, and Python? How did you overcome any obstacles?
Have you had experience implementing containerization solutions in a production environment? If so, what challenges did you face and how did you address them?
How do you approach problem-solving in your work with regards to IT projects? Can you provide an example where you had to troubleshoot issues related to Kubernetes or Docker?
In what ways have you contributed to the improvement of IT processes or workflows in your previous roles? Can you share any specific initiatives you led or participated in?
How do you prioritize tasks and manage your time effectively in a fast-paced IT environment, especially when working with multiple technologies like Kubernetes, Docker, and Python?
Can you discuss your experience collaborating with cross-functional teams or leading teams in IT projects? How do you ensure effective communication and coordination among team members?
